name: @beautifullife/markdown-splitter
description: Split a Markdown file into multiple linked HTML files with navigation

scripts.test: npm run test:clean && npm run test:split && npm run test:verify
scripts.test:verify: test -f test-output/index.html && test -d test-output && find test-output -name '*.html' | grep -q .
